name: 太平洋之嵐6 ～ 史上最大的激戰諾曼第攻防戰! Pacific Storm 6 - Battle for Normandy
publisher: 英特衛多媒體股份有限公司
description: " Pacific Storm” series is a war simulation game. It is a scene of historical facts, and it has been praised by many historical war fans.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 above Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c, v3 shaders and 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c, v3 shaders and 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
